name: NO-CLIP
description:
NO-CLIP is a backrooms game developed in Godot.

IMPORTANT: if you can't move your camera, try modifying the slider in the options, that'll fix it!

Good news! The game has officially released with version 1.0!

Changelog 1.0:

-more levels

-shaders

-revamped menu with settings

-revamped flashlight

-spookier atmosphere

-gromit mug

-gromit mug

-gromit mug

-gromit mug

-5 levels to die in! can you find them all?

Changelog 1.2:

-bug fixes

-better scares
